name: Blood & Loss
description:
In search of her missing lover, a blood mage wanders into a dark tower filled with ghastly horrors. Guide her as she makes her way to the top, but be wary - as a blood mage, her magical attacks will drain her life force!

Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 43.

How to play
  • WASD: Movement
  • Left click: Stab
  • Right click: Haemostream (Blood Beam)
  • Space: Haemosurge (Blood Wave)
